notes.title: Informational Bulletin: Impact of OSS CVEs in Cortex XDR Agent

product.name: Palo Alto Networks Cortex XDR Agent

notes.text: This CVE does not affect Cortex XDR agent as the Cortex XDR agent does not use the affected functionality.
